channel.title: Sorceror games should have Neut Kings (or Good)
channel.description:
It feels a tad bit too stacked when a game has both Evil King and Sorceror. At the end of the game I internally say "geez that was a waste of effort was there any point" and then cry myself to sleep.
And if it is less than a 16 player game, and/or Unseen no less. That is brutal, and I'm speaking from most often being on the evil faction in this scenario. It's a bloodbath
It would be interesting if a Sorceror game always meant a Neut King game though.
Just some thots
